body.name: Somdot Nightstand, 24.6'' Height Bedside Table End Table for Bedroom Nursery Living Room - Removable Fabric Drawer, Open Storage Shelf, Sturdy Steel Frame, Durable Wood Top - Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 24 mins
features: 🏡 Multipurpose: Somdot nightstand is 24.6 inches in height. It is ideal for beds with a height of 20 inches to 29 inches. It fits in many locations throughout your home and also can be used as an end table next to a sofa, as a side table in living room, or as a toy storage in nursery

🏡 High Quality: Strong steel frame, durable wood board, adjustable plastic feet and premium fabric drawers all contribute to its sturdy construction to ensure durability against wear and tear over time

🏡 Easy Assembly: Hardware is included for hassle-free assembly. Follow the instruction and you can put it together in a few steps. Drawer dimension 14.4 inches (L) x 10.8 inches (W) x 6.9 inches (H); Overall dimension 16.5 inches (W) x 11.8 inches (D) x 24.6 inches (H)

🏡 Stylish & Smart: Simple and modern style makes it fit to any decor. Lightweight design and one removable drawer is convenient for daily use. It provids plenty of storage space, and mixes & matches with Somdot storage dressers or chest of drawers for a unique home style
🏡 24/7 Service: Somdot professional support team are on standby. Please contact us with any issue at any time. We aim to bring you 100% satisfaction and provide 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect beside your bed or in an office/living room
reviews.reviewText: This nightstand is designed with a sleek black finish, enhancing the aesthetics of your bedroom, nursery, or living room. The removable fabric drawer offers convenient storage, while the open shelf provides additional space for your essentials.The sturdy steel frame ensures durability, and the durable wood top adds a touch of sophistication. Whether you're looking for a stylish bedside companion or an accent piece, this nightstand delivers on both fronts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this table! It matches the description. It’s sturdy (except for the bin that slides in). This style and price range was exactly what I was looking for. The only issue I have is that I ordered it in black, but the brown wood was sent to me :,(. I didn’t realized till halfway through that I was sent the wrong color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Goes perfect with my bed frame, very sturdy well made. Very easy to assemble took my husband and I 20mins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I just wanted black
reviews.reviewText: The pictures for the nightstand I ordered and returned and then placed a whole new order both came with black all over EXCEPT the 2 "wood" surfaces. Why do the images in the description show all black if that's not what the customer will get. Too much hassle. I'm keeping the junk this time. And I do mean junk. Both wood pieces have a corner chipped and there a bulges you can see in the planks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and practical
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with this open storage shelf. Just the right size to accommodate the essentials. Strong and easy to build. Stylish and practical, I'm going to buy another one for the guest room! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value for a basic model
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this nightstand in black. It’s a pretty good value ($25 currently) for a nightstand. Do be aware that it’s a very basic version of a nightstand. It’s fairly sturdy but still looks a bit on the cheap side. I’d say this is definitely more appropriate for a nursery or maybe child’s room, perhaps an adult who isn’t super concerned with the aesthetics. My big problem is that the drawer is fabric. I saw that in the description but didn’t realize how noticeable it is. What I can say is that building drawers is the bane of my existence so while fabric isn’t my personal preference, it was nice to build. Speaking of the build, this is a notably quicker build than most nightstands (with one or more drawers involved).Overall, this is not a bad nightstand, especially for current price. I’m not a fan of the fabric drawer personally, but that’s my preference. I would recommend if you need something on the cheap and don’t mind a fabric drawer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish end tables
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love these, they were quick to put together and seem sturdy so far. The color of them is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Es muy bonita y tiene buena calidad
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Es una mesita de noche muy bonita y de buena calidad se ve muy linda en el cuarto cumplió las expectativas que tenía 🤩

The iron frame is sturdy, easy to install, and was ready in less than half an hour. The instructions were clear and the accessories came with a screwdriver. It is very stable after installation. The drawers are large enough to put a lot of things. The quality of the board is very good, feel very good looks very texture. The nightstand is just the right size and can be placed anywhere.
